sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Coordinate System Act of 2024.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Coordinate System Act of 2024.

sections.heading: Purpose. The Illinois Coordinate System Act is established for the purpose of compiling accessible, accurate, reliable, and repeatable data for use in the Illinois Coordinate System and the Illinois State Plane Coordinate System
